newsitem.title: USA: CBOE to list GT Interactive, Parker Drilling.
newsitem.headline: CBOE to list GT Interactive, Parker Drilling.

text.p: The Chicago Board Options Exchange (CBOE) said Wednesday it will list options on GT Interactive Software Corp on December 10 and on Parker Drilling Co on December 11.
The CBOE said GT Interactive options will open with strike prices of five, 7-1/2 and 10, with initial expirations in January, February, April and July.
Kessler Asher has been named designated primary market maker.
For Parker Drilling, opening strikes have been set at 7-1/2, 10 and 12-1/2, with introductory expirations in January, February, April and July.
The CBOE said Parker Drilling options would trade in the Ford Motor Co trading crowd.
